subject: Water Polo
lead_paragraph: The United States men’s team lost to Serbia, 7-3, in the FINA World League Super Final in Genoa, Italy. But the silver-medal performance bolsters the team’s budding chances of contending for a medal in the Beijing Olympics in August. Once considered something of a long shot, the team upset Croatia, ranked No. 1 in the world, this month.
